name: ACW
tag_list: design, integrated, full-service, graphics, print, media, apps, pos, agency, publications, web-design, websites, online, offline
overview:
ACW are a full-service design agency with over 20 years experience producing bespoke and innovative campaigns for clients across a broad range of sectors.

Our diverse range of clients includes; UNHCR, Save the Children, CARE International, Bobbi Brown, L’Oreal, Elemis, NHS Barnet and TRAD Construction to name a few, where we have worked on a series of projects large and small offering research, strategy, online and offline marketing solutions. Our expertise covers the following areas:

  • Strategy and Consulting
  • Graphic Design
  • Digital Communications
  • Social Marketing
  • Brand Communications
  • Online/Offline Strategy
  • Content Management
  • Print
  • Advertising
  • App Development

Despite the economic downturn, we have doubled our turnover in the last four years and continue to grow our areas of expertise. One of the reasons for our success include our track record for delivering considerable return on investment for our clients, recent examples include a 1000% ROI on a direct mail campaign for Bobbi Brown and a 17% increase in Chlamydia testing rates in Barnet, following a sexual health campaign we conducted for BU21 aimed at young adults aged 18-24.

We are an approved supplier to a number of organisations including; the United Nations, the LVMH Group, the World Health Organisation, the NHS and Estée Lauder. Our qualifications include; Recommended Agency Register status, N3 compliance and ISO 9001. If you would like to find out more or view further examples, please visit our website at www.acw.uk.com.
